Block.Text: Contact Contribute Forum Support Download Documentation
Login to post a new forum topic.
For news and announcements to the Drupal community at large.
For less technical discussions about the Drupal project. Not for support questions!
Showcase your site to others, maybe share a little about it - modules, theme, why you used Drupal.
For events, conferences and other Drupal happenings.
For interface guidelines, mockups, and usability feedback.
Try searching the forums first or a specific project's bug reports. Remember all support on this site is on a volunteer basis, so please visit the forum tips for posting hints.
Is Drupal a viable solution for my website?
For problems with installing a new Drupal site.
For problems with upgrading an existing Drupal site.
Drupal is up and running but how do I ...?
Need help migrating your site to Drupal?
For questions about commercial Drupal hosting.
Consulting, contracts, RFPs, jobs, bounties, and more.
For translating the Drupal user interface.
Forums that are no longer actively used. Please see the module issue queue or the appropriate group on http://groups.drupal.org
For problems and solutions related to database compatibility.
Everything documentation related, ranging from end-user documentation to marketing material.
For everything related to the main Drupal distribution.
43 min 53 sec ago by Barry Ramage
For anything related to maintenance of drupal.org, including the website, the mailing lists, and the CVS repositories.
For everything related to documents, images, audio and video.
For problems and solutions related to performance and scalability.
Everything groups, user interaction, moderation, rating, profile management, etc.
